root.name: Guilty Gear XX Slash
root.description: OverviewGuilty Gear XX Slash is a 2D fighting game developed and released by Arc System Works for Japanese arcades on September 2005. Later published in Japan for the the PlayStation 2 on April 13, 2006, the game is the third iteration of Guilty Gear XX (after Guilty Gear XX #Reload). It was later succeeded by Guilty Gear XX Î› Core.In addition to various balance changes, the game adds two new characters (A.B.A., an artifical lifeform from Guilty Gear Isuka wielding a monstrous key, and Order-Sol, a brand new variation of Sol Badguy prior to leaving the Holy Order) and new changes to all stages (including new stages and themes for the new characters).
